messages.title: NEW LABOUR'S LEGACY
messages.content: Rising unemployment. Widening North-South divide. North East neglected. Out of control antisocial behaviour. Widening inequality. Pensioners forgotten. Uncontrolled immigration. WE NEED A FRESH START

keyPolicies.policyTitle: I will ALWAYS put the North East First
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The North East has been ignored for too long. I will put the North East and North Durham FIRST and party second.
We must act to create jobs and grow our economy moving again. We must be at the forefront of green industry and high tech manufacturing and create 200,000 new apprenticeships.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Zero tolerance on anti social behaviour
keyPolicies.policyDescription: It is time to fight back against louts and social troublemakers. We must give the Police real power to crack down on crime.

Protecting the NHS with year on year spending increases; defending local GP's surgeries from Labour cuts; a top quality education for all; stronger discipline in schools; and linking pensions to earnings.
Immigration is out of control under Labour. Conservatives would impose strict limits on immigration and introduce a Border Police Force to regain control of our borders.

mentions.candidate: I pledge to put North Durham and the North East first. I will fight hard for the people of North Durham

issues.immigration: Immigration is out of control under Labour. Conservatives would impose strict limits on immigration and introduce a Border Police Force to regain control of our borders.

images.caption: DAVID SKELTON FROM NORTH DURHAM FOR NORTH DURHAM
